description.en:
By building a decentralized ecosystem of powered by a new cryptocurrency called OUR Token, we grantee GUEST easy access to personalized time-and-money-saving services and information suited to their taste, while giving HOST the opportunity to use their unique knowledge as a source of income.
OUR Token provides a platform for hotel / restaurant / flight / rental service and entertainment of booking service. Through partnership with various companies, we ensure best services at a low price.
